title: Prepare for an Interview
description: A reporter is about to conduct a major interview and needs to prepare a thorough list of questions and background materials.

tasks.description: Conduct in-depth research on the interviewee and the topic of discussion.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent is fully briefed on the subject matter.

tasks.description: Draft a list of 20-30 potential questions, starting with easy rapport-building questions and moving to more challenging ones.
tasks.expected_outcome: A structured and comprehensive question list is created.

tasks.description: Organize all background research and the question list into a single briefing document to be used during the interview.
tasks.expected_outcome: A complete interview prep package is created.
